CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT( Display_Type__c ) == 'Green', IMAGE('/resource/1470622569000/AccountScoring/Green.JPG', TEXT(Score__c)) + ' ' + TEXT(Score__c), IF(TEXT( Display_Type__c ) == 'Yellow', IMAGE('/resource/1470622569000/AccountScoring/Yellow.JPG', TEXT(Score__c)) + ' ' + TEXT(Score__c), IF(TEXT( Display_Type__c ) == 'Red', IMAGE('/resource/1470622569000/AccountScoring/Red.JPG', TEXT(Score__c)) + ' ' + TEXT(Score__c), '' )))
CustomField.label: Display Score
